			<section data-mw-section-id="-1" id="mwBA"><div class="mw-heading mw-heading2" id="mwAA"><h2 id="Welcome_to_Wikivoyage"><span style="font-size:40px"><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Wikivoyage:Welcome,_newcomers" title="Wikivoyage:Welcome, newcomers">Welcome</a> to <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Wikivoyage:About" title="Wikivoyage:About">Wikivoyage</a></span></h2></div>
			<p id="mainpage-tagline">The free worldwide travel guide that <i><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Wikivoyage:Plunge_forward" title="Wikivoyage:Plunge forward">you can edit</a></i>.<br><span style="font-size:smaller">The official, non-commercial <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="#siteContainer" class="mw-selflink-fragment">sister site</a> <b>of Wikipedia</b> for sightseeing, activities, cuisine and accommodation around the world.</span></p>
				<div id="mainpage-searchinput">
					<form name="bodySearch0.299967748600" id="bodySearch0.299967748600" class="bodySearch mw-inputbox-form-inline inputbox-searchengine-not-set" action="/wiki/Special:Search" typeof="mw:Extension/inputbox" about="#mwt4" data-mw="{"name":"inputbox","attrs":{},"body":{"extsrc":"\n\t\t\t\t\t\tplaceholder=Where would you like to travel?\n\t\t\t\t\t\ttype=search2\n\t\t\t\t\t\twidth=28\n\t\t\t\t\t\tbuttonlabel=Go\n\t\t\t\t\t\tbreak=no\n\t\t\t\t\t"}}"><div class="bodySearchWrap" style=""><div class="cdx-text-input"><input name="search" class="mw-searchInput cdx-text-input__input" size="28" id="bodySearchInput0.299967748600" dir="ltr" placeholder="Where would you like to travel?"></div> <input type="submit" name="go" value="Go" class="cdx-button"></div></form>
				</div>
			<p class="mainpage-touristoffice">Got a specific question? Ask it at the <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Wikivoyage:Travel_forum" title="Wikivoyage:Travel forum">travel forum</a>.</p>

	<div><section data-mw-section-id="-1" id="mwOA"><div class="mw-heading mw-heading3" id="mwRg"><h3 id="Discover"><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Discover" title="Discover">Discover</a></h3></div><figure class="mw-halign-right" typeof="mw:File"><a href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:Flamingos_on_Gediz_River_Delta.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img resource="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:Flamingos_on_Gediz_River_Delta.jpg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/86/Flamingos_on_Gediz_River_Delta.jpg/250px-Flamingos_on_Gediz_River_Delta.jpg" decoding="async" data-file-width="1365" data-file-height="910" data-file-type="bitmap" height="133" width="200" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/86/Flamingos_on_Gediz_River_Delta.jpg/330px-Flamingos_on_Gediz_River_Delta.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/86/Flamingos_on_Gediz_River_Delta.jpg/500px-Flamingos_on_Gediz_River_Delta.jpg 2x" class="mw-file-element"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
<ul><li>Home to <b>over 250 bird species</b> (<i>flamingos pictured</i>), the salt marshes of Gediz Delta outside <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Izmir" title="Izmir">Izmir</a> are known as the Bird Paradise.</li>
<li>As the <b>home of author Stephen King</b>, <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Bangor_(Maine)" title="Bangor (Maine)">Bangor, Maine</a>, appears often in fictional works.</li>
<li>Located just across the sea from Taiwan, <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Fujian" title="Fujian">Fujian</a> province is the <b>ancestral homeland for most Taiwanese</b>, and continues to share close cultural ties with the island.</li></ul></section></div>
	<div><section data-mw-section-id="-1" id="mwOQ"><div class="mw-heading mw-heading3" id="mwRw"><h3 id="Get_involved!"><span id="Get_involved.21" typeof="mw:FallbackId"></span><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Wikivoyage:Plunge_forward" title="Wikivoyage:Plunge forward">Get involved!</a></h3></div><figure class="mw-halign-right" typeof="mw:File"><a href="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:Be_bold2.svg" class="mw-file-description"><img resource="//en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/File:Be_bold2.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8d/Be_bold2.svg/250px-Be_bold2.svg.png" decoding="async" data-file-width="750" data-file-height="750" data-file-type="drawing" height="125" width="125" class="mw-file-element"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
